segments.text: I see this kitchen filled with the warmth of the day, sunlight spilling through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I feel a pang of anxiety as I notice the water overflowing from the sink, pooling steadily on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so absorbed in her task, polishing that plate as if nothing else exists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, they have such mischievous glints in their eyes, aware of the chaos they are about to cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the boy balance precariously on that stool, and I can't help but feel my heart race with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager posture, arm outstretched toward the cookie jar, makes me smile fleetingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, I shake my head at the carelessness of it all; the mess that’s about to unfold is almost unbearable.
segments.speaker: PAR
